Uses of Class
escpos.EscPos

  • Packages that use EscPos 
    Package Description
    escpos  

    • Uses of EscPos in escpos

      Methods in escpos that return EscPos 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EscPos EscPos.cut(EscPos.CutMode mode)
      Executes paper cutting.
      EscPos EscPos.feed(int nLines)
      Call feed with default style.
      EscPos EscPos.feed(Style style, int nLines)
      Prints the data in the print buffer and feeds n lines.
      EscPos EscPos.info() 
      EscPos EscPos.initializePrinter()
      Initialize printer.
      EscPos EscPos.pulsePin(EscPos.PinConnector pinConnector, int t1, int t2)
      Generate pulse.
      EscPos EscPos.setCharacterCodeTable(EscPos.CharacterCodeTable table)
      Select character code table.
      EscPos EscPos.setCharsetName(java.lang.String charsetName)
      Set charsetName used on encodes of Strings.
      EscPos EscPos.setOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
      Each write will be send to output Stream.
      EscPos EscPos.setPrinterCharacterTable(int characterCodeTable)
      Select character code table on the printer.
      EscPos EscPos.setStyle(Style style)
      Set style of actual instance.
      EscPos EscPos.write(BarCodeWrapperInterface barcode, java.lang.String data)
      Send bar-code content to the printer.
      EscPos EscPos.write(byte[] b, int off, int len)
      Writes bytes directly to outputStream.
      EscPos EscPos.write(ImageWrapperInterface wrapper, EscPosImage image)
      Send image to the printer.
      EscPos EscPos.write(int b)
      Writes one byte directly to outputStream.
      EscPos EscPos.write(java.lang.String text)
      Calls write with default style.
      EscPos EscPos.write(Style style, java.lang.String text)
      Write String to outputStream.
      EscPos EscPos.writeLF(java.lang.String text)
      Calls write and feed on end.
      EscPos EscPos.writeLF(Style style, java.lang.String text)
      Calls write and feed on end.
